name: Splitter.RootProvider
description: A component that divides your interface into resizable sections
description_zh: A component that divides your interface into resizable sections

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。
